!Hierarch Kekropus: That is how the Age of the Giants ended. After they passed, the Elves became dominant, then the Orcs, and now the Humans.%% But for those of us sealed within Arviterre Laboratory, which became known as the Isle of Souls, it was as if time had stopped. Only thanks to a man in black armor who was able to penetrate the seal did we from time to time learn of the happenings in the wider world. Then one day, the man came with a woman in a dazzling blue dress. They announced their intention to unbind the seal and reveal the Island and its inhabitants to the other races. We Kamael were needed, they said, to help fight the growing threat of Shilen and her evil followers.%% [Quest _067_SagaOfTheDoombringer 0-2|Continue listening.]
